sentences.en: Beware of the inpidual who is pushy or coming on too strong.
sentences.cn: 小心那些人,谁有进取心,谁来势凶猛.

sentences.en: But she insisted and was very pushy.
sentences.cn: 但她一直坚持,而且很急于求成.

sentences.en: Don't appear to be pushy or overly anxious to get a job.
sentences.cn: 不必过分表现急着要工作.

sentences.en: He expressed a lot of anger towards the pushy salesperson.
sentences.cn: 他对那些锲而不舍的销售人员表现出愤怒.

sentences.en: I don't want to pushy , but you'll have to decide soon.
sentences.cn: 我不想让您以为我在催您, 无非你确凿要快点下抉择.

sentences.en: I don't want to sound pushy, but you'll have to decide soon.
sentences.cn: 我不想让您认为我在催您, 不过你确实要快点下决定.

sentences.en: I'm not influenced by a pushy salesperson.
Mitch: Be tactful. Customers don't like a pushy salesperson.
sentences.cn: 米契: 要讲究技巧. 客户不喜欢咄咄逼人的业务员.

sentences.en: My mother encouraged us, but was never pushy.
sentences.cn: 我的母亲鼓励我们但从不强迫我们。

sentences.en: My mother gave a bit of her mind to the pushy salesperson.
sentences.cn: 我母亲对固执己见的销售人员指出其错误,并加以责备.

sentences.en: Payers are being more pushy about getting patients to take generics.
sentences.cn: 药物费用的支付者更倾向于让病人使用非专利药.

sentences.en: She was a confident and pushy young woman.
sentences.cn: 她是个自信又固执己见的年轻女性。

sentences.en: The people who settled the town called successively Terminus , Marthasville and Atlanta, were a pushy people.
sentences.cn: 在这个先后叫做特米尔纳斯、马撒斯维尔和亚特兰大的市镇落户的人, 都是很有闯劲的.

sentences.en: This doesn't even need to come across as bing pushy, just helpful.
sentences.cn: 不必表现的太强势, 只要让人觉得你有心帮忙.

sentences.en: You were crazy before, but you were never pushy.
sentences.cn: 你以前有些疯狂, 但从没不切实际.

words.tran_cn: 富有进取心的；有精力的
奋斗的；莽撞的；有精力的；富有进取心的
推；决心；奋力；攻击；干劲；进取心
推进器；推进式飞机；推销员；非法销售者
推挤；推人犯规（篮球术语）
推；推进；增加；伸展；努力争取
有进取心的；爱出风头的；有冲劲的；固执己见的

trans.tran_cn: 有进取心的，固执己见的，一意孤行的
trans.tran_en: someone who is pushy does everything they can to get what they want from other people –used in order to show disapproval
